com.retrieval.algorithms

Class TfidfVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.retrieval.algorithms.TfidfVector

  • public class TfidfVector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for calculate the TFIDF vector space model between query expansion content and subtopic language model Build the IDF value for query part and subtopic part in constructor
    Author:
    birui
    See Also:
    which is the method can give the score by given subtopic id and query id
